appName.description: Automatically clicks the 'Yes' button in YouTube Music when playback pauses after a period of user inactivity. Mutes and skips Ads in a playback. Also works for music.yandex.ru and radio.yandex.ru

appDesc.message: Automatically clicks the 'Yes' button in YouTube Music when playback pauses after a period of user inactivity. Mutes and skips Ads in a playback. Also works for music.yandex.ru and radio.yandex.ru
